displaytitle: Copy after Engraving by Agostino Carracci of "The Martyrdom of St. Justina of Padua," after Veronese
medium: Pen and brown ink on paper
creditline: Gift of Dr. Tracey J. Moreno in memory of Pauline Wasylak and in honor of Carly Grabowski, Class of 2008, on the occasion of her 5th reunion
markings: Recto, in black ink, upper left: Stamp of Comte J. von Ross?, (L. 2693) (See reference Bib. 4661);

texts.textentryhtml: Comte J. von Ross?; Sotheby’s Parke-Bernet Galleries, New York, December 10, 1958, lot 3 (See reference Bib. 5518); Boggis Estate; Christie, Manson & Woods, New York, July 10, 1962, lot 172 (See reference Bib. 5519); Pauline Wasylak.;<?xml:namespace prefix = "o" ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /><o:p></o:p>

caption: After Agostino Carracci (Italian, 1557–1602), Copy after Engraving by Agostino Carracci of "The Martyrdom of St. Justina of Padua," after Veronese, 17th or 18th century. Pen and brown ink on paper; 46.1 × 59.6 cm. Gift of Dr. Tracey J. Moreno in memory of Pauline Wasylak and in honor of Carly Grabowski, Class of 2008, on the occasion of her 5th reunion (2013-2)
